title: Functions with a domain containing at least two different elements

blocks.name: fundmge2nop0
blocks.content: A function with a domain containing (at least) two different elements is not an ordered pair. This stronger version of ~ fundmge2nop (with the less restrictive requirement that ` ( G \ { (/) } ) ` needs to be a function instead of ` G ` ) is useful for proofs for extensible structures, see ~ structn0fun . (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fundmge2nop0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0)))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wa(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0)))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(c0, universe))
  imp(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  com13(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  syl6(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))), wi(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wrex(hs1, cdm(c0), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wrex(hs1, cdm(c0), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  ex(wcel(cdm(c0), universe), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wrex(hs1, cdm(c0), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  hashge2el2dif(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), universe)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cdm(c0), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  df-ne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  com23(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wi(wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  con3d(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl5bi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wex(hs3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))
  elvv(hs2, hs3, c0)
  com12(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wex(hs2, wex(hs3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  exlimivv(hs2, hs3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  impcomd(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sylbid(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wfun(cdif(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls))))
  funeqd(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdif(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))
  difeq1(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls))
  syl5bi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wfun(cdif(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wfun(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))
  funeqi(cdif(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls)), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  eqcomi(cdif(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), csn(emptycls)), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  opwo0id(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))
  com23(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wfun(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wi(wfun(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), cdm(c0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))
  dmeq(c0, cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  expcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))), wfun(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  3expb(wfun(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  funopdmsn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs3), universe, universe)
  eqid(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  vex(hs2)
  vex(hs3)
  prcnel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs3.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c0))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
}

blocks.name: fundmge2nop
blocks.content: A function with a domain containing (at least) two different elements is not an ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 9-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: fun2dmnop0
blocks.content: A function with a domain containing (at least) two different elements is not an ordered pair. This stronger version of ~ fun2dmnop (with the less restrictive requirement that ` ( G \ { (/) } ) ` needs to be a function instead of ` G ` ) is useful for proofs for extensible structures, see ~ structn0fun . (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fun2dmnop0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  pm2.61d1(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(c0, universe))
  ex(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  simpl1(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  nehash2(cdm(c0), universe, c1, c2, wa(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe)))
  adantl(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  adantr(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  3ad2ant3(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))))
  simpl(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  adantr(w3a(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  3ad2ant3(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))))
  prss(c1, cdm(c0), c2)
  simpr(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  simpl2(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wne(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c2), cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  fundmge2nop0(c0)
  prcnel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fun2dmnop0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0))â†’ Â¬ c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  âŠ£ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
} = {
  pm2.61d1((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0)), Â¬ c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  ex((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0)), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, Â¬ c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  syl2anc(((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0))âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ), Â¬ c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… })), 2[â‰¤](# ` dom(c0)))
  simpl1(Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… })), c1 â‰  c2, { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  nehash2(dom(c0), universe, c1, c2, ((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0))âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  adantl((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0)), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, dom(c0)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  adantr((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0)), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  3ad2ant3(Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… })), c1 â‰  c2, { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  sylbir({ c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), (c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ dom(c0)))
  simpl(c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), c2 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  adantr((Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… }))âˆ§ c1 â‰  c2 âˆ§ { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0)), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  3ad2ant3(Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… })), c1 â‰  c2, { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c2 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  sylbir({ c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c2 âˆˆ dom(c0), (c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ dom(c0)))
  prss(c1, dom(c0), c2)
  simpr(c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), c2 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  simpl2(Fun((c0 \ { âˆ… })), c1 â‰  c2, { c1, c2 } âŠ† dom(c0), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  fundmge2nop0(c0)
  prcnel(c0, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
}

blocks.name: fun2dmnop
blocks.content: A function with a domain containing (at least) two different elements is not an ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 9-Jun-2021.)
